It worked for me but the problem is that you will play from the autosave point not when you last save.
BUT i thought a solution:

* After you do all the above steps, play the game and choose save.

* Go to (for XP) C:\Documents and Settings\Nikos\My Documents\Ghost Pirates

* View the files in Detail mode so you can see now the name, the size AND the date of each file.

* Look for the BIN file with the most recent date (for instanve mine is 1267925374.91)

* Open that file with the text editor (notepad).

* Copy everything inside.

*Now open the Autosave bin file with the text editor.

*Erase everything inside and paste the lines you just have copied.

* Save and exit from the editor.

* Run the game

* With the first steps the game automatically load the autosave savegame and with the last steps you 've changed your last save as autosave, so now you will play from the point you have left the game

* Enjoy!!
